mixed-citation.article-title: Middle Permian ostracods (Crustacea) from the Guadalupe Mountains, West Texas, USA

USA • 1 left valve ; Guadalupe Mountains , West Texas , Williams Ranch Member , Cutoff Formation, Quarry section, sample GM1; Roadian , Middle Permian ; MNHN.F.F63371
•
1 complete carapace ; Guadalupe Mountains , West Texas , ‘McKittrick Canyon’ Member , Bell Canyon Formation , MKCS1 section, sample 2 (GM6); Capitanian , Middle Permian ; MNHN.F.F63372
•
1 left valve ; Guadalupe Mountains , West Texas , Williams Ranch Member , Cutoff Formation , Quarry section, sample GM2; Roadian , Middle Permian ; MNHN.F.F63373
•
3 complete carapaces , 10 valves ; Guadalupe Mountains , West Texas , Williams Ranch Member , Cutoff Formation , Quarry section, samples GM1, GM3, GM4; Roadian ; MNHN.F.F63653
•
2 complete carapaces , 7 valves ; same locality as for preceding; ‘ McKittrick Canyon’ Member , Bell Canyon Formation , MKCS1 section, samples 4 (GM5) and 2 (GM6); Capitanian , Middle Permian ; MNHN.F.F63475
